comment.text: This translation key contains a button label that opens desktop editors for an organization. The text includes a placeholder {{organizationName}} to be replaced with the actual organization name.

usage.context:
<Button
 onClick={onOpenEditorsPopup}
 size="medium"
 primary
 isDisabled={isDisabled}
 label={t("PrivacyButton", {
 organizationName: logoText,
 })}
 />
 
 <label className="privacy-rooms-text-separator" />

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "{{organizationName}} Desktop Editors tətbiqini açmaq" is too literal. A more natural translation would be something like "{{organizationName}} Desktop Editors proqramlarını aç" or "{{organizationName}} Desktop Editors tətbiqələrinə daxil ol".  'Tətbiqini açmaq' is not the idiomatic way to express opening an application.

The translation "Բացեք {{organizationName}} աշխատասեղանի հավելվածի խմբագրիչները" is a bit literal and could be improved for natural flow. It translates to 'Open {{organizationName}} desktop application editors'.  A more natural phrasing might be 'Open {{organizationName}} Desktop App Editors' or 'Launch {{organizationName}} Desktop App Editors'.
The Italian translation uses the singular "Editor" instead of the plural form required to match "Desktop Editors". Since "Desktop Editors" is plural, the corresponding Italian should also be plural.

The Lao translation "ເປີດແກ້ໄຂ {{organizationName}} Desktop" is a literal translation and doesn't convey the intended meaning of "Open {{organizationName}} Desktop Editors."  It translates to "Open Edit {{organizationName}} Desktop."  The word 'Editors' is missing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ເປີດຕົວແກ້ໄຂຂອງ {{organizationName}} Desktop

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation lacks proper phrasing for a button label. It reads a bit clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ເປີດຕົວແກ້ໄຂ {{organizationName}} Desktop

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Otwórz pakiet {{organizationName}} Desktop Editors" doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "Open {{organizationName}} Desktop Editors." "Pakiet" implies a package or suite, which might not be the intended meaning. A more direct translation would be "Otwórz edytory Desktop {{organizationName}}" or "Uruchom edytory Desktop {{organizationName}}".
The Turkish translation includes an apostrophe (') after 'Editors'. This is unnecessary and grammatically incorrect in this context.

The translation 'Відкрити настільні редактори {{organizationName}}' is too literal and doesn't flow naturally in Ukrainian. A more natural phrasing would be 'Відкрити редактори робочого столу {{organizationName}}' or 'Відкрити редактори {{organizationName}} для робочого столу'.

The translation of "Desktop Editors" is not ideal. "Trình chỉnh sửa" is accurate for 'editors', but "cho Máy tính" is a more literal translation of 'Desktop' and sounds less natural in Vietnamese. A better phrasing would be something like "phiên bản máy tính" or simply omitting it.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Mở phiên bản {{organizationName}} trên máy tính
